Wamenag Jelaskan Maksud Jokowi yang Usul Istilah 'Manipulator Agama'
03 Nov 2019, 09:54 by Samsudhuha Wildansyah
Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) mengusulkan adanya perubahan istilah radikalisme menjadi manipulator agama. Wakil Menteri Agama (Wamenag) Zainut Tauhid pun memberi penjelasan.
"Saya kira itu yang harus dipahami adalah semangat Bapak Presiden agar memahami agama itu dalam konteks yang benar. Karena, benar, agama itu hadir untuk berikan kedamaian," kata Zainut kepada wartawan di Jalan MH Thamrin, Jakarta Pusat, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Zainut mengaku tidak mempermasalahkan soal pergantian istilah itu. Menurutnya, sifat radikalisme maupun manipulator agama harus ditolak bersama-sama.
"Ya, apa pun istilahnya, apakah itu manipulator agama ataukah perusuh agama, perusuh yang ingin menciptakan situasi yang bisa mencerai beraikan bangsa Indonesia. Itu harus kita tolak bersama," katanya.

Deputy Minister of Religion Explains Jokowi's Purpose, Proposed by the Term 'Religious Manipulators'
03 Nov 2019, 09:54 by Samsudhuha Wildansyah
Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) proposed the change of the term radicalism into a religious manipulator. Deputy Minister of Religion (Wamenag) Zainut Tauhid also gave an explanation.
"I think that what must be understood is the spirit of the President to understand the religion in the right context. Because, true, the religion is present to provide peace," Zainut told reporters on Jalan MH Thamrin, Central Jakarta, Sunday (3/11 / 2019).
Zainut claimed not to have a problem about the change of the term. According to him, the nature of radicalism and religious manipulators must be rejected together.
"Yes, whatever the term, is it a religious manipulator or a religious rioter, a rioter who wants to create a situation that can disintegrate the Indonesian nation. We must reject it together," he said.
